Happy 2020 everyone! The Cresko Lab is looking forward to another exciting year of research and discovery!

As we enter a new decade, we're energized by the research opportunities ahead and grateful for the amazing team that makes our science possible. Here's to a year filled with breakthrough discoveries, successful experiments, and continued collaboration.

## Reflecting on 2019

What a year it's been! Highlights include:
- Major publications advancing our field
- New grant funding for innovative projects
- Awards and recognition for lab members
- Welcoming new talented researchers
- Strengthening collaborations locally and globally
- Even getting a beer named after us!

## Looking Ahead to 2020

We're excited about:
- New genomics projects launching this year
- Expanding our syngnathid research program
- Developing innovative techniques and approaches
- Training the next generation of scientists
- Contributing to pressing scientific questions

## Research Goals

In 2020, we aim to:
- Advance understanding of rapid evolution
- Develop new genomic resources
- Strengthen our outreach efforts
- Foster inclusive research environments
- Build new collaborative partnerships

## Team Science

Our success comes from:
- Dedicated graduate students and postdocs
- Talented undergraduate researchers
- Exceptional research staff
- Collaborative spirit
- Supportive research environment

## Gratitude

Thank you to:
- All lab members past and present
- Our collaborators near and far
- Funding agencies supporting our work
- The University of Oregon community
- Everyone who makes our research possible

## New Year's Resolutions

For 2020, we resolve to:
- Push the boundaries of evolutionary genomics
- Support each other's success
- Communicate our science effectively
- Maintain work-life balance
- Continue making science fun and engaging

Here's to a productive, healthy, and happy 2020! May your experiments work, your data be clean, and your discoveries be impactful!

Wishing everyone in our extended scientific community a wonderful new year!
